languages.text: "Это... странно, учить вас тому, как мы бьемся против вас же".
"It is... strange to teach you the methods we employ to fight against you."
languages.original_text: "Это... странно, учить вас тому, как мы бьемся против вас же".

traits.locale_text: "It would be... strange to teach you the ways we are fighting against you."
"It would be... strange to teach you the ways we are fighting against you."
"It is... strange to teach you the methods we employ to fight against you."
"It would be... strange to teach you the methods we employ to fight against you."
"It would be... strange to teach you the methods we employ to fight against you."
"It is... strange to teach you the methods we employ to fight against you."
"It is... strange to teach you the methods we employ to fight against you."
"It is... strange to teach you the methods we employ to fight against you."

languages.text: “将我们用来对付人类的方法传授给你……这种感觉真奇怪。”
languages.original_text: "It is... strange to teach you the methods we employ to fight against you."

traits.locale_text: “将我们用来对付人类的方法传授给你……这种感觉真奇怪。”
“将我们用来对付人类的方法传授给你……这种感觉真奇怪。”

languages.text: «Es... extraño enseñarle los métodos que empleamos para luchar contra ustedes».
languages.original_text: "It is... strange to teach you the methods we employ to fight against you."

traits.locale_text: «Es... extraño enseñarle los métodos que empleamos para luchar contra ustedes».

languages.text: 「あなたと戦うために採用している手法を張本人のあなたに教えるとは...奇妙な話だ」
languages.original_text: "It is... strange to teach you the methods we employ to fight against you."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたと戦うために採用している手法を張本人のあなたに教えるとは...奇妙な話だ」
「あなたと戦うために採用している手法を張本人のあなたに教えるとは...奇妙な話だ」

languages.text: « Il est... plutôt étrange de vous apprendre les méthodes que nous utilisons pour vous combattre. »
languages.original_text: "It is... strange to teach you the methods we employ to fight against you."

traits.locale_text: « Il est... plutôt étrange de vous apprendre les méthodes que nous utilisons pour vous combattre. »

languages.text: "Es ist ... merkwürdig, Euch die Methoden zu lehren, die wir im Kampf gegen Euch einsetzen."
languages.original_text: "It is... strange to teach you the methods we employ to fight against you."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist ... merkwürdig, Euch die Methoden zu lehren, die wir im Kampf gegen Euch einsetzen."
"Es wäre ... merkwürdig, Euch die Methoden zu lehren, die wir im Kampf gegen Euch einsetzen."

languages.text: "Soydaşlarına karşı savaşırken kullandığımız yöntemleri sana öğretmek... Biraz tuhaf."
languages.original_text: "It is... strange to teach you the methods we employ to fight against you."

traits.locale_text: "Soydaşlarına karşı savaşırken kullandığımız yöntemleri sana öğretmek... Biraz tuhaf."
